properties.name: Baku Old City (Icherisheher)
properties.description: UNESCO walled medieval city with Maiden Tower and Palace of the Shirvanshahs

properties.name: Flame Towers
properties.description: Iconic trio of skyscrapers with LED screens displaying flames, defining Baku's skyline

properties.name: Gobustan
properties.description: UNESCO rock art site with 6,000 petroglyphs and nearby bubbling mud volcanoes

properties.name: Yanar Dag
properties.description: Natural gas fire burning continuously on hillside, symbol of Land of Fire

properties.name: Sheki Khan's Palace
properties.description: 18th-century summer residence with stunning stained glass and intricate frescoes
